title: Ensure Digital Backpack builds successfully and add required static assets

requirements.text: Fix the React entry component so the frontend TypeScript build succeeds (e.g., ensure React is imported correctly in frontend/src/App.tsx and there are no invalid imports placed after the default export).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` compiles under TypeScript/ESLint rules used by the project (no imports after executable code / after export).
`dfx deploy` (or the platform build step) completes without frontend compile errors.

requirements.text: Add the required generated static images under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames referenced by the UI so the app renders without missing-asset errors.
acceptanceCriteria: When loading the unauthenticated landing screen and the authenticated app shell header, the logo and background pattern render (no broken image icons / 404s in the browser network panel).

constraints: Do not edit files under the immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep all Motoko backend logic within the single actor at `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if an upgrade requires state migration.
nonGoals: Adding new product features beyond making the app generate/build successfully (e.g., new item fields, new pages, new auth providers).
Introducing external databases or third-party services.

required: Backpack logo mark, flat vector style (backpack-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Seamless camping/gear pattern background, subtle, low-contrast (backpack-pattern.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 6 simple item category icons (clothing, toiletries, electronics, documents, food, misc), monochrome (backpack-icons.dim_512x512.png)
